text:
"Martha Speaks" is a television show. It first aired on September 1, 2008. It ended on November 18, 2014. The main character of the show is Martha who is a dog young.
On June 10, 2013, the creator of Martha Speaks sued WGBH for getting not a lot of money.
Cancellation.
On November 18, 2014, Martha Speaks aired its final episode and got cancelled.
